name: Robots Vs Bugs
description:
WSAD - movement

Spacebar - shooting

"J" "K" "L" - to control minions

"E" "Q" - to use turrets

Game jam babe. Couldn't find a team so made a game from free assets and assets I previously bought.  Here is  a list:

Music and sounds:

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/invasion-aliens-ants-and-androids-voice-pack...

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/explosion-sound-fx-explosion-volume-i/

Graphixc:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/pixel-boxes-low-pol...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/voxel-scifi-environ...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/quarter-view-3d-action-asset...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/pursuit-fighter-spaceshi...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/voxelbus-98088

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/meshtint-free-poly...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-4010

Hope you enjoy it!
